description: Deletes a SAML provider resource in IAM. Deleting the provider resource from IAM does not update any roles that reference the SAML provider resource's ARN as a principal in their trust policies. Any attempt to assume a role that references a non-existent provider resource ARN fails.

parameters.name: SAMLProviderArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SAML provider to delete.
